1370: Batten moved to Trysgens.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Ghodelde at age 21 in 1370.
Had a son with Ghodelde, Alwar, at age 21.
1371: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Verthwi, at age 22.
1372: Had a son with Ghodelde, Gheeneman, at age 23.
1374: Had a daughter with Ghodelde, Gisele, at age 25.
1378: Had a son with Ghodelde, Gabriel, at age 29.
1379: Had a son with Ghodelde, Sanse, at age 30.
1380: Lost son Gheeneman when Gheeneman was 9 years old.
1381: Lost daughter Verthwi when Verthwi was 11 years old.
1383: Lost son Alvericus when Alvericus was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Ghodelde gave birth to their stillborn son Alvericus in 1383.
1385: Lost daughter Gisele when Gisele was 12 years old.
